item.title: Crossfeed VALVE Light(s) – Dual VALVE Installation – Both Lights Inoperative

remarks.para: Except for ER operations, may be inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: Both crossfeed valves are verified to be operative, and
Both main fuel quantity indications are operative.

placard.para: Placard Crossfeed VALVE Light(s) "LIGHT INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
